body_html: I like Cmake but we have experienced many misalignments problems in Caffe community maintaining two build systems. Every extension or contribution that involve the build system need to be double checked. And often developer don't have confidence with both build systems contributing code with partial coverage or different quality level. Android cmake support was not really maintained and never incorporated officially (see taka-no-me/android-cmake#64)

body: I like Cmake but we have experienced many misalignments problems in Caffe community maintaining two build systems. Every extension or contribution that involve the build system need to be double checked. And often developer don't have confidence with both build systems contributing code with partial coverage or different quality level. Android cmake support was not really maintained and never incorporated officially (see https://github.com/taka-no-me/android-cmake/issues/64)
